editorialNotes.standard: Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.
We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

ios.subtitle: Make dank memes and have fun!

editorialNotes.standard: Be our guest and bring iconic Disney and Pixar scenes to life in this charming Tri Peaks solitaire game.

ios.subtitle: Train your brain and kill time

editorialNotes.standard: Clear boards by spelling words rather than building piles of cards in this clever spin on the all-time classic.

editorialNotes.standard: Build streaks and candify postcards of locations like Waikiki Beach and the Eiffel Tower in this sugary sweet spin on solitaire.

editorialNotes.standard: There’s nothing quite like Solitaire. This classic game can be as peaceful or intense as you’d like—and we can’t decide if we’d rather compete with the clock or just relax and reshuffle until we find the right card. Microsoft’s updated the experience with colorful backdrops and plenty of new modes. And yes—they’ve kept that iconic jumping-cards victory screen
